reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable and well-made, with a perfect fit that can be adjusted for length. They describe it as flattering, highlighting curves in all the right places, and appreciate its stretchiness. The dress receives positive feedback for its looks, with one customer noting it's fancy enough for a wedding, and another mentioning it's true to size. The color receives mixed reactions from customers.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars You’ll Look & Feel pretty in this Dress!!!
items.body: I ordered medium and I love the color. I chose the teal blue. It’s so comfortable. Fits perfectly with the awesome shape where that I had underneath. I also bought it in red it fits great and I love the built-in slip. Also has nice quality stitching very pretty. A must have! Read more
items.author: Sharita

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering, Confident, and Beautifully Designed
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This dress exceeded expectations in both quality and fit. The mesh overlay and ruching detail create a flattering silhouette that highlights curves in all the right places without feeling too tight or restrictive. The fabric is soft, stretchy, and breathable, providing both comfort and structure — rare for a form-fitting style. Wearing this dress gave me a huge boost of confidence — it’s one of those pieces that instantly makes you feel put-together and powerful. It hugs the body comfortably and moves with you, not against you, and the fit is true to size. Overall a great value! Read more
items.author: rane koehler

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous and classy dress! Solids are better than patterns
items.body: I ordered this dress in four different colors – the teal and black pattern, the purple and black pattern, and plain Red and plain black. I thought the patterns would better disguise any body flaws, but the ruching is so amazing that disguising is not necessary. I didn't really care for the patterning anyway, and it disguises the mesh portion of the top which I think is the dress's best feature! Also the teal and black one had a weird very large black swath from the collar to the bust area which I definitely would have returned for a different dress even if I kept the pattern. I'm returning the patterned ones, and keeping the red and the black. They are gorgeous, inexpensive, and super classy looking. There is no seam down the middle of the back which makes the dress look much more expensive. I am 5'4" tall, 117 pounds, 34C bust, 28 inch waist, 35" hips. The size small fit me beautifully. Read more
items.author: Flammajamma

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s cute and fits but…
items.body: The dress itself is very cute and fit perfectly on me. It was very stretchy and hugged my curves perfectly. My ONLY complaint is that the dress was clearly worn previously and sent back in the same condition as it was worn and the dress smelled awful. It smelled like BO and dollar store body spray. My dirty bin smelled bad, my room smelled bad, everything smelled bad. This may not fall on the company but people are gross to say the least. I’m glad that I always wash clothes before I wear them. Read more
items.author: Nadia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute and comfy
items.body: I love this dress! Cant wait to wear it again. I ordered a Xl and fit perfectly. Was a little worried because normally wear 2Xl. It’s very stretchy! Read more
items.author: Heather Anderson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Odd fit for a short girl
items.body: Pretty dress but it for me weird. The armpit area was low so made it to where I couldn’t raise my arms. Maybe it’s just my body type. The material was good and very pretty. Read more
items.author: Megan C.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yeah!
items.body: I wasn’t expecting much from this dress but l was pleasantly surprised at the quality and fit. It’s sexy and simple. Does what it’s supposed to do - look good on you :) Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Color
items.body: The sizing is spot on, I am a size large and it fits great. The color is beautiful and the quality of the material is very nice and soft. The arms and top of the neck is see through, but the body of the dress is lined. There is some stretch to the dress, so it could fit an XL if you do not mind it fitting more snug. Read more
items.author: Ashley

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Cocktail Ruched Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Cocktail Ruched Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 01 - Black, 01 - Red, 02 - Purple Print, 02 - Red Print, 02 - Lake Blue Print, 02 - Blue Print, 01 - Green, 01 - Coffee, 02 - Pink Floral Print, 03 - Leopard Print, 03 - Blue White Print, 03 - Brown Print. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
